name: Falchion of Doom
description: A sword that glows hellish red, it is said to be forged by the Deathknights themselves, the blade and the handle are decorated by the bones of their enemies.
tooltip: Double Slash (40%): Deals 2-12 slashing damage and 2-8 darkness damage.
Big Slash (40%): Deals 2-12 slashing damage and 1-8 darkness damage. This attack has a +10% critical chance.
Shadow Slashes (20%): Deals 9-20 slashing damage and 12-16 darkness damage. This attack has a +5% critical chance.
